Well, zach, I do know that -- recently -- many Democrats (and a few Republicans) stood up for our First Amendment right to free speech, while many Republicans voted to violate one of the token reasons for the founding of this country, one that we all claim to hold dear.
 
 Why Republicans would be inclined to do this, especially in light of Bush's violation of our Fourth Amendment rights, the general government's violation of our Fourth Amendment rights, and Bush's ordering the violation of Fifth, Sixth, and Eight Amendment rights, is beyond me. I mean, I could guess, but I wouldn't want to speculate...
